channel.title: Blog Posts on ButterCat
channel.description: Recent content in Blog Posts on ButterCat

item.title: Variational Quantum Eigensolver in Ground States Estimation of Molecules
item.description: This blog page provides a summary of a particular application of VQE on chemistry, which is to evalue the ground states of a molecules.

item.title: Ising Model with Transfer Matrix Method
item.description: This blog will breifly go through the steps to find the analytical solution to one dimension Ising Model for ferromagnetism via transfer matrix method.

item.title: Ising Model with Numerical Analysis
item.description: This blog aims to give a breif walkthrough to the numerical solution of the Ising Model.

item.title: Renormalization Group Method on Ising Model
item.description: Solving the 1D Ising model with three methods: numerical method, transfer matrix method and renormalization group method. Then, solve particular systems with 2D and 3D Ising model numerically.

item.title: Renormalization Group Method on Period Doubling
item.description: This blog will demonstrate the method of renormalization group as an alternative way of understanding the phenomena of period doubling.
